```{r setup}
library(linmod)
library(bench)
```

To run a simple linear regression with `linear_model`:

```{r}
linear_model(Y=mtcars[,"mpg"],mtcars[,"hp"])
```

`linear_model` coefficients match those from `lm`:

```{r}
all.equal(as.numeric(unlist(lm(mtcars[,"mpg"]~mtcars[,"hp"])[["coefficients"]])),
          as.numeric(unlist(linear_model(Y=mtcars[,"mpg"],mtcars[,"hp"])[["Estimates"]])))
```

Compare run time of `linear_model` to that of `lm`:

```{r}
result <- bench::mark(as.numeric(unlist(lm(mtcars[,"mpg"]~mtcars[,"hp"])[["coefficients"]])),
                      as.numeric(unlist(linear_model(Y=mtcars[,"mpg"],mtcars[,"hp"])[["Estimates"]])))
```

View table of result:

```{r}
print(result)
```

View plot of result:

```{r}
plot(result)
```
